sense.gloss: venting one's anger (on someone or something), taking out one's anger on

sdata.j: オレに↑八↑↓|や↓つ↑当↑↓あ↓たり|するなよ。
sdata.e: Don't take it out on me.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はいつも↑人↑↓ひと↓に|やつあたり|をします。
sdata.e: He really has it out for people.

sdata.j: ↑八↑↓|や↓つ↑当↑↓あ↓たり|するつもりはなかったのよ。
sdata.e: I didn't mean to take it out on you.
